snippet: Investigators say that Eddie Calderon-Melendez, the founder of a Brooklyn network of charter schools, falsified tax returns and charged a European vacation to a school account.
abstract: Eddie Calderon-Melendez, founder and chief executive of a troubled network of charter high schools in Brooklyn, is indicted by a grand jury on 11 felony counts, including tax fraud, grand larceny and falsifying business records.
lead_paragraph: Investigators say that Eddie Calderon-Melendez, the founder of a Brooklyn network of charter schools, falsified tax returns and charged a European vacation to a school account.

headline.seo: Founder of Brooklyn Charter Schools Is Indicted on Fraud Charges
headline.main: A Leader of Schools Is Indicted for Fraud
headline.print_headline: A Leader Of Schools Is Charged With Fraud
